author: Alexi McCammond
title: Biden campaign asks Trump campaign to pull video testing Twitter
description: Joe Biden's campaign is calling on President Trump's re-election campaign to pull a "wildly irresponsible" video from Twitter that splices in sound to falsely depict Biden calling the coronavirus a hoax — and they're asking Twitter to remove the ad if the pre…
